LanguageData.BloodcreteFloor.label: bloodcrete
LanguageData.BloodcreteFloor.description: Bloodcrete. It is cheap and quick to build, and not bad to look at.
LanguageData.FlagstoneBloodstone.label: bloodstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneBloodstone.description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. These are not beautiful, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways. Deconstructing flagstone yields no resources.
LanguageData.TileBloodstone.label: bloodstone tile
LanguageData.TileBloodstone.description: Carefully-cut and fit stone tiles for a castle feeling. They are pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
